Articles.Content:
I have encountered a very annoying but not game breaking bug. If I try to Eva and use the jet pack to move around, it actually causes my kerbal to spin. And if I time accelerate or look at the map, It causes the kerbal to freeze in place, unable to move himself, and yet the spinning problem persists! Please help. This is on PS4 with the cursor preset ( because I didin't bother to relearn the controls for radial)

Edited June 29, 2018 by DunaManiac

Do you put SAS on before you use jetpack?   I use radial, but have had my Kerbal spin uncontrollably.  I don’t remember exactly what I did, but I feel like it had to do with not having SAS on.  Ever since then I always make sure to put it on and haven’t had the spinning issue again.

Edited June 29, 2018 by OrganizedChaos
Yes i do, and I use cursor. But it still happening.

Deactivate sas Push r1+x (maybe it was l1+x) activate sas again. That helps me most of the Time when that happens

Edited July 5, 2018 by PrvDancer85
